title: Tunneling time in coupled-channel systems
authors: Peng Guo, Vladimir Gasparian, Antonio P\'erez-Garrido, Esther J\'odar
abstract:
In present work, we present a couple-channel formalism for the description of
tunneling time of a quantum particle through a composite compound with multiple
energy levels or a complex structure that can be reduced to a
quasi-one-dimensional multiple-channel system.
